question: Can you give me a recipe for a traditional Ethiopian dish and generate an image of it?

steps.content: Can you give me a recipe for a traditional Ethiopian dish and generate an image of it?
Plan: 1) Search for a traditional Ethiopian dish recipe. 2) Generate an image of the dish. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for a traditional Ethiopian dish recipe.
Recipe for Doro Wat: 1 whole chicken, 2 onions, 3 tbsp berbere spice, 2 tbsp niter kibbeh, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp ginger, 4 boiled eggs.
Generating an image of Doro Wat.
What is berbere spice and how can I make it at home?
Plan: 1) Search for information on berbere spice and a homemade recipe. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for information on berbere spice and a homemade recipe.

Berbere spice is a blend of spices including chili peppers, garlic, ginger, basil, and fenugreek. Homemade recipe: 1 tbsp paprika, 1 tsp cayenne, 1 tsp ginger, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1/2 tsp fenugreek, 1/2 tsp cinnamon, 1/2 tsp allspice.

Recipe for Doro Wat: 1 whole chicken, 2 onions, 3 tbsp berbere spice, 2 tbsp niter kibbeh, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp ginger, 4 boiled eggs. Image of Doro Wat generated.
